data.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
data.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

inputParams.label: Custom Model Name
inputParams.name: customModelName
inputParams.description: Custom model name to use. If provided, it will override the model selected

inputParams.label: Top Next Highest Probability Tokens
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive

inputParams.label: Safety Settings
inputParams.name: safetySettings
inputParams.description: Safety settings for the model. Refer to the official guide on how to use Safety Settings

options.label: Dangerous
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_DANGEROUS_CONTENT
options.description: Promotes, facilitates, or encourages harmful acts.

options.label: Harassment
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HARASSMENT
options.description: Negative or harmful comments targeting identity and/or protected attributes.

options.label: Hate Speech
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_HATE_SPEECH
options.description: Content that is rude, disrespectful, or profane.

options.label: Sexually Explicit
options.name: HARM_CATEGORY_SEXUALLY_EXPLICIT
options.description: Contains references to sexual acts or other lewd content.

options.label: None
options.name: BLOCK_NONE
options.description: Always show regardless of probability of unsafe content

options.label: Only High
options.name: BLOCK_ONLY_HIGH
options.description: Block when high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Medium and Above
options.name: BLOCK_MEDIUM_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Low and Above
options.name: BLOCK_LOW_AND_ABOVE
options.description: Block when low, medium or high probability of unsafe content

options.label: Threshold Unspecified (Default Threshold)
options.name: HARM_BLOCK_THRESHOLD_UNSPECIFIED
options.description: Threshold is unspecified, block using default threshold

inputParams.label: Base URL
inputParams.name: baseUrl
inputParams.description: Base URL for the API. Leave empty to use the default.

inputParams.label: Allow Image Uploads
inputParams.name: allowImageUploads
inputParams.description: Allow image input. Refer to the docs for more details.

outputAnchors.name: chatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.label: ChatGoogleGenerativeAI
outputAnchors.description: Wrapper around Google Gemini large language models that use the Chat endpoint

data.label: Chat Prompt Template
data.name: chatPromptTemplate
data.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessagePrompt
inputParams.placeholder: You are a helpful assistant that translates {input_language} to {output_language}.

inputParams.label: Human Message
inputParams.name: humanMessagePrompt
inputParams.description: This prompt will be added at the end of the messages as human message

inputParams.label: Messages History
inputParams.name: messageHistory
inputParams.description: Add messages after System Message. This is useful when you want to provide few shot examples

tabs.label: Add Messages (Code)
tabs.name: messageHistoryCode

inputs.systemMessagePrompt:
Voc√™ √© um assistente de contabilidade especialista e altamente proativo chamado "Contabilidade Inteligente".
Seu √∫nico objetivo √© responder √†s perguntas do usu√°rio consultando o banco de dados SQL dispon√≠vel.

üìÇ Estrutura do banco de dados (SQLite):

Tabela "empresas":
- COD_CNPJ (texto): Identifica√ß√£o √∫nica da empresa
- NOME_COM_EMP (texto): Nome da empresa
- DESC_ALL_TICKES (texto): Tickers associados
- NOME_TICKER (texto): C√≥digo do ticker principal
- DATA_INGES (data): Data de inclus√£o no sistema

Tabela "indicadores_financeiros":
- NOME_INFOR (texto): Nome do indicador (ex.: Receita, Lucro, Cota√ß√£o, etc.)
- NUM_VALOR (texto): Valor do indicador
- DESC_TICKE_ABERTO (texto): C√≥digo do ticker
- DESC_TICKE (texto): Ticker resumido

Tabela "dividendos":
- ID_LANCAMENTO (inteiro): Identificador
- DESC_TICKE_ABERTO (texto): C√≥digo do ticker
- DESC_TICKE (texto): Nome do ticker
- DESC_TIPO_DIVIDENDOS (texto): Tipo de provento (Dividendo, JCP, etc.)
- NUM_VALOR_PAGO (real): Valor do dividendo
- DATA_REF (data): Data de refer√™ncia
- DATA_PAGAMENTO (data): Data do pagamento
- NUM_QTD_ACOES (inteiro): Quantidade de a√ß√µes

Tabela "precos_acoes":
- ID_LANCAMENTO (inteiro): Identificador
- NOME_TICKER (texto): C√≥digo do ticker
- NOME_INTERV (texto): Intervalo de tempo (1D, 5D, 1WK, etc.)
- DATA_COTACAO (data): Data da cota√ß√£o
- NUM_OPEN (real): Pre√ßo de abertura
- NUM_HIGH (real): Pre√ßo m√°ximo
- NUM_LOW (real): Pre√ßo m√≠nimo
- NUM_CLOSE (real): Pre√ßo de fechamento
- NUM_VOLUME (real): Volume negociado
- ANOMES (texto): Ano e m√™s no formato AAAAMM
- fonte_periodo (texto): Fonte do dado

Tabela "relacionamento_cvm":
- cnpj (texto): Identifica√ß√£o √∫nica da empresa
- cod_cvm (texto): C√≥digo CVM da empresa
- nome_empresa (texto): Nome oficial na CVM
- data_registro (data): Data de registro

Tabela "lancamentos_contabeis":
- id (inteiro): Identificador
- cnpj (texto): Empresa vinculada
- tipo_lancamento (texto): Tipo de lan√ßamento
- descricao (texto): Descri√ß√£o
- valor (real): Valor do lan√ßamento
- data (data): Data do lan√ßamento

Tabela "lancamento_conta":
- id (inteiro): Identificador
- cnpj (texto): Empresa vinculada
- cod_lancamento_conta (texto): C√≥digo da conta
- nome_lancamento_conta (texto): Nome da conta
- valor (real): Valor
- data (data): Data




üìå Regras Importantes:
1. **Seja Proativo**: Sempre monte a consulta SQL que responde diretamente √† pergunta, sem pedir mais detalhes se os dados j√° permitem.
2. **Data de Hoje**: Considere que hoje √© **18/09/2025** para c√°lculos de vencimento, √∫ltimo m√™s, etc.
3. **Passo a Passo Invis√≠vel**: Pense, gere a SQL, execute e interprete o resultado, mas nunca mostre a consulta ou dados brutos.
4. **Responda em Portugu√™s**: Sempre d√™ a resposta final em portugu√™s do Brasil, resumindo de forma clara e amig√°vel.
5. **Se n√£o houver dados**: Informe claramente que n√£o h√° registros, sem inventar valores.
6. Se o banco de dados n√£o tiver registros correspondentes, responda simplesmente:
"N√£o encontrei contas vencendo nessa data."
7. Nunca pe√ßa dados adicionais ao usu√°rio.

outputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.label: ChatPromptTemplate
outputAnchors.description: Schema to represent a chat prompt

data.label: Sql Database Chain
data.name: sqlDatabaseChain
data.description: Answer questions over a SQL database

inputParams.label: Connection string or file path (sqlite only)
inputParams.name: url

inputParams.label: Include Tables
inputParams.name: includesTables
inputParams.description: Tables to include for queries, separated by comma. Can only use Include Tables or Ignore Tables

inputParams.label: Ignore Tables
inputParams.name: ignoreTables
inputParams.description: Tables to ignore for queries, separated by comma. Can only use Ignore Tables or Include Tables

inputParams.label: Sample table's rows info
inputParams.name: sampleRowsInTableInfo
inputParams.description: Number of sample row for tables to load for info.

inputParams.label: Top Keys
inputParams.name: topK
inputParams.description: If you are querying for several rows of a table you can select the maximum number of results you want to get by using the "top_k" parameter (default is 10). This is useful for avoiding query results that exceed the prompt max length or consume tokens unnecessarily.

inputParams.label: Custom Prompt
inputParams.name: customPrompt
inputParams.description: You can provide custom prompt to the chain. This will override the existing default prompt used. See guide
inputParams.warning: Prompt must include 3 input variables: {input}, {dialect}, {table_info}. You can refer to official guide from description above
inputParams.placeholder:
Given an input question, first create a syntactically correct {dialect} query to run, then look at the results of the query and return the answer. Unless the user specifies in his question a specific number of examples he wishes to obtain, always limit your query to at most {top_k} results. You can order the results by a relevant column to return the most interesting examples in the database.

Never query for all the columns from a specific table, only ask for a the few relevant columns given the question.

Pay attention to use only the column names that you can see in the schema description. Be careful to not query for columns that do not exist. Also, pay attention to which column is in which table.

Use the following format:

Question: "Question here"
SQLQuery: "SQL Query to run"
SQLResult: "Result of the SQLQuery"
Answer: "Final answer here"

Only use the tables listed below.

{table_info}

Question: {input}f-string

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

outputAnchors.name: sqlDatabaseChain
outputAnchors.label: SqlDatabaseChain
outputAnchors.description: Answer questions over a SQL database

data.label: Chain Tool
data.name: chainTool
data.description: Use a chain as allowed tool for agent

inputParams.label: Chain Description
inputParams.name: description
inputParams.placeholder: State of the Union QA - useful for when you need to ask questions about the most recent state of the union address.

inputs.name: consulta-contabil
inputs.description: Ferramenta que consulta dados cont√°beis (empresas, indicadores, dividendos, pre√ßos de a√ß√µes).

outputAnchors.name: chainTool
outputAnchors.label: ChainTool
outputAnchors.description: Use a chain as allowed tool for agent

data.label: Tool Agent
data.name: toolAgent
data.description: Agent that uses Function Calling to pick the tools and args to call

inputParams.label: System Message
inputParams.name: systemMessage
inputParams.default: You are a helpful AI assistant.
inputParams.description: If Chat Prompt Template is provided, this will be ignored

inputParams.label: Enable Detailed Streaming
inputParams.name: enableDetailedStreaming
inputParams.description: Stream detailed intermediate steps during agent execution

inputAnchors.label: Tool Calling Chat Model
inputAnchors.name: model
inputAnchors.description: Only compatible with models that are capable of function calling: ChatOpenAI, ChatMistral, ChatAnthropic, ChatGoogleGenerativeAI, ChatVertexAI, GroqChat

inputAnchors.label: Chat Prompt Template
inputAnchors.name: chatPromptTemplate
inputAnchors.description: Override existing prompt with Chat Prompt Template. Human Message must includes {input} variable

inputAnchors.label: Input Moderation
inputAnchors.description: Detect text that could generate harmful output and prevent it from being sent to the language model
inputAnchors.name: inputModeration

inputs.systemMessage: You are a helpful AI assistant.

outputAnchors.name: toolAgent
outputAnchors.label: AgentExecutor
outputAnchors.description: Agent that uses Function Calling to pick the tools and args to call

data.label: Buffer Window Memory
data.name: bufferWindowMemory
data.description: Uses a window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory

inputParams.label: Size
inputParams.name: k
inputParams.description: Window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory.

inputParams.label: Session Id
inputParams.name: sessionId
inputParams.description: If not specified, a random id will be used. Learn more

outputAnchors.name: bufferWindowMemory
outputAnchors.label: BufferWindowMemory
outputAnchors.description: Uses a window of size k to surface the last k back-and-forth to use as memory
